features: 【Strong & Powerful】The sink Organizer cover has a strong negative gravity and a precise structure. The steel frame in the middle can withstand a huge weight, eliminating the need to worry about deformation or sagging in the middle, And the foldable makeup mat is with a lightweight body, it's convenient for small bathrooms, Rvs, Campers and Travel.

【Space Saver】Small Bathroom Must Haves Accessories that expanding the space of the countertop and keep all your makeup gadgets organized; the organizer mat size is 20.2 inch * 15.8 inch, which Heat resistant to 480 degrees Fahrenheit-protection for curling irons, hairdryers, flat irons, styling brushes heat damage.
【Easy to DIY】Cutting faucet area for easy use water flowing from tap and storage box area for organizer makeup accessories into it which is very convenient to use.
【Storage Box for free】The storage box can help store some beauty products, such as eyebrow pens, makeup brushes, etc., greatly keeping your sink countertop keep neat and avoiding all clutter.
【Easy to store and clean】Our products can be easily rolled up and stored conveniently. You can choose to hang them up or take them for travel.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our sink manager, can be freely DIY trimmed or folded to achieve the desired effect, increasing the sink space and making. perfect use of any space in the bathroom, making life more convenient. ADVANTAGES: MAKEUP BRUSH CLEANER：Makeup brushes can be easily cleaned. STURDY AND DURABLE：Built-in Rigid Bracket, sturdy and durable. SAFE FOR HOT TOOLS：Protect bathroom surfaces from potential burn marks while using your favorite hot hair irons.This sink top cover mat is heat resistant up to 425 °F, so you can safely rock any style without worry. TRAVEL：Your sink top cover is ready to accompany you on any adventure. lt's light weight and rolls up for compact storage.Keep it secure in your bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well in small area
reviews.reviewText: I'm very pleased with this silicone mat that works well over a bathroom sink to give me extra space when working in a small area. I don't have the luxury of a large countertop in my bathroom so I now have that option. Great product and very sturdy besides storage or to travel with!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: If you have a small bathroom and no counter space GET THIS!!I use it daily and it makes getting ready in the AM so much easier.Wipes clean easily (I got makeup on it)Can be rolled up and stowed out of the way.I cut a small area out of it for the water and it works great!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I needed more counter space on our tiny sink vanity. this gives me just that and I can put hot tools on it and dump my whole makeup bag out on it and it has not not bowed in or fallen at all. it is very sturdy. I am happy with it for sure!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sink cover keeps cats out of sink
reviews.reviewText: I got this cover to keep my cats from playing in the sink and tracking and slinging water all over the bathroom. It does a super good job!! One of the cats even sleeps on top of it, so it's sturdy. It covers the entire sink and you can sit things on top of it and it will not fall down into the sink from the weight of the item. An awesome find. Annoying sometimes when I have to remove it to wash my hands, but very worth the hassle to avoid cats making water mess.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for small spaces
reviews.reviewText: Very sturdy. Great for my small bathroom folds up easily and stores easily. Definitely buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Serves its purpose!
reviews.reviewText: Doesn't lay exactly flat, so some things might tip over. Serves its purpose though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sagged under a little weight
reviews.reviewText: I loved the idea of this item, but when I sat makeup etc on it, it sagged under the weight. It was too flexible for my liking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Use every day in my very small bathroom and will be bringing for travel. Easy to clean!
